verbose_text: The integrin alphavbeta6 mediates emphysema, NSCLC, pulmonary fibrosis, acute lung injury, influenza infection, epithelial injury and repair due to its ability to activate the TGFbeta signaling pathway.
evidence: integrin alphavbeta6 mediates emphysema, NSCLC, pulmonary fibrosis, acute lung injury, influenza infection, epithelial injury
